      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String phone,
              int totalScore,
              int totalQRCodes,
              android.graphics.Bitmap playerAvatar,
              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> qrCodesScanned,
              int highestScore)
        Constructor used to create Players from documents in the database
        Parameters:
        username - player's username
        phone - player's phone number
        totalScore - total score of a player's scanned QR codes
        totalQRCodes - number of QR codes a player has scanned
        playerAvatar - player's avatar picture
        qrCodesScanned - list of QR code names scanned by the player

      • findQRCodeScanned

        public boolean findQRCodeScanned​(java.lang.String qrCode)
        Looks for a QRCode in list of scanned QR codes
        Parameters:
        qrCode - QRCode to look for in list of scanned QR codes
        Returns:
        Return true if the qrCode is found in list of scanned QR codes, false otherwise

      • removeQRCodeScanned

        Parameters:
        qrCode - QRCode to remove in list of scanned QR codes
